episodes.title: He Escaped Scientology. Now They’re Trying to “Destroy” Him | Apostate Alex | EP 2
episodes.description:
Former Scientologist and activist Apostate Alex joins me to reveal what life is really like inside the Church of Scientology, from the hierarchy and belief systems to the psychological control that keeps people trapped. We talk about how empowering ideas can be turned into tools of manipulation, how Alex escaped, and how he’s now helping others find freedom.

Find out more about Apostate Alex: 
1) https://apostatealex.com/ (WEBSITE)
2) https://www.youtube.com/@apostatealex (YOUTUBE)

| Chapters |
(0:00) Intro
(0:53) What Drew Alex to Scientology
(5:52) The Hierarchy and Different Types of Scientologists
(9:19) Getting Kicked Out of Scientology
(10:08) How Empowering Beliefs Become Tools of Manipulation
(15:05) Governments vs Scientology 
(20:07) They Are Trying to "Destroy" Him
(22:52) How Alex Reaches People Inside the Church
(24:38) Why He Continues to Fight
(26:10) Advice for Those Questioning Scientology
(27:42) Resources for Escaping or Getting Help
(29:09) How We Can Support Those Trying to Escape
(30:55) Final Thoughts: Be Careful

EP 2
